Elemental Aid.name: 元素之助 Elemental Aid
Elemental Aid.description:
这个祝福授予英雄一项特殊能力，可在接下来的24小时内使用一次。一旦使用，这个祝福就会结束。

通过花费1个动作呼唤风的力量，英雄可以用下一个动作飞行最多40尺远。他必须在坚实的地表上结束移动——如果他不这样做，就会坠落，并受到等同于坠落距离一半的钝击伤害。

Belt of Good Health.name: 健康腰带 Belt of Good Health
Belt of Good Health.description: 当你戴上这条腰带时，它的银扣开始发光，光芒慢慢扩散到中央的心形珠宝上。这会使你的当前生命值和最大生命值增加4点。如果你脱下腰带，你的最大生命值和当前生命值都会立即减少4点。

Healing Potion.name: 治疗药水 Healing Potion
Healing Potion.description: 治疗药水是一瓶宝石红色的液体，饮用者的伤口会迅速愈合，并带来一阵刺痛。当你喝下治疗药水后，你恢复[[/r 1d8[healing]]]{1d8点生命值}。

Polished Shield.name: 抛光盾牌 Polished Shield
Polished Shield.description:
与木制盾牌一样，钢制盾牌也有各种形状和尺寸。虽然比木制盾牌更贵，但它们往往更耐用。

硬度 HP BT
5 20 10

这面盾牌雕刻得像一头咆哮的狮子。由于其精美的艺术性，它的价值为5gp。

Scroll of 1st-level Spell.name: 1环级法术卷轴 Scroll of 1st-level Spell
Scroll of 1st-level Spell.description:
从卷轴中施法要求你用一只手持握卷轴，并进行一次施法动作，花费该法术在正常情况下所需的动作来启动它。

想要从一张卷轴中施法，该法术必须出现在你的法术列表中。因为是你在施法，所以使用你的法术攻击骰和法术 DC。该法术也获得与你的魔法根源相关联的特征（奥术、神术、异能、原能）。

所有物质材料成分与花费都在卷轴被创造时提供了，因此你在使用卷轴施法时不需要再次提供。你必须将法术的任何材料成分替换为一个姿势成分。如果该法术需要一个器材，你必须拥有该器材才能从卷轴中施展这个法术。

备注：如果想要创建一个特定法术的卷轴或魔杖，把该法术从合集包里拖到一个 PC、NPC、Loot 表的背包里即可。

Smoking Sword.name: 冒烟的剑 Smoking Sword
Smoking Sword.description:
这把+1魔法长剑不断喷出烟雾。此剑击中时能造成额外1点火焰伤害。你可以在握着剑的同时使用一个特殊动作来命令剑刃燃起火焰。

燃火 Stoke Flames A（专注）

直到你的回合结束前，剑刃能造成1d6点额外火焰伤害，而非1点。在你使用此动作后，10分钟内不能再次使用。

Cleric Equipment.name: 牧师装备 Cleric Equipment
Cleric Equipment.description:
护甲: 链甲衫（如果你的力量为 +2 或更高，则改为皮甲）

武器: 如果你信仰黛丝娜，你使用星刃。如果你信仰塞恩蕾，你使用弯刀。如果你信仰托拉格，你使用战锤。

冒险道具: 冒险装备包、医疗工具包、盾牌、木制圣徽

剩余金币: 1 枚金币

Fighter Equipment.name: 战士装备 Fighter Equipment
Fighter Equipment.description:
护甲: 胸甲

武器: 匕首、短弓（60支箭矢）

冒险道具: 冒险装备包、修理
工具包

剩余金币: 1金币

如果你是好战的战士，你可以获得一把巨剑或一把巨斧。如果你是使用盾牌的战士，你可以获得一面盾牌以及一把长剑或一把战斧。如果你是双武器战士，你可以获得一把长剑和一把短弓，或一把战斧和一把短柄斧。

Rogue Equipment.name: 游荡者装备 Rogue Equipment

武器：匕首、细剑、短剑

冒险道具：冒险者装备包、医疗工具包、盗贼工具包

剩余金币：2金币

Wizard Equipment.name: 法师装备 Wizard Equipment

武器: 弩（60 支弩矢）、匕首

冒险道具: 冒险装备包、法术书

剩余金币: 10 金币

Inside This Module.name: 在本模组内 Inside This Module

Getting Started.name: 从这里开始 Getting Started
Getting Started.text:
迈出第一步，进入一个奇妙的奇幻冒险世界！Pathfinder新手包包含了你学习如何玩探路者角色扮演游戏所需的一切，包括创建你自己的幻想英雄的规则，以及创作你自己的精彩故事的工具。

欢迎来到Pathfinder新手包！本模组从基础开始构建，为您提供简明但详尽的Pathfinder第二版游戏系统介绍，以及如何在FVTT中充分利用其功能。随着你在《奥塔里地下的威胁》冒险中的进展，你所读到的日志条目将为你提供从游戏规则到软件使用的全部说明。

我该从哪儿开始？

本模组的大部分内容都具有很强的关联性，这意味着你不需要太担心阅读顺序。如果有相关内容，我们会尽量添加链接，你在任何时候都只需点击一下就能找到相关内容。然而，当你刚开始阅读时，大量的文本可能会令人望而生畏，所以这里有一些我们推荐的阅读起点！

  • 如果你是FVTT新手，那么左边的一些标签会说明如何使用这个冒险中包含的各种类型的内容。

  • 如果你想了解更多关于Pathfinder第二版规则，那么@UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.pgOC3zCWvUFGiuTj]{什么是角色扮演游戏？ What's a Roleplaying Game?}日志可以帮助你了解关键概念。

  • 如果你想直接进入《奥塔里地下的威胁》冒险，那么你只需要召集一些玩家，并查阅@UUID[JournalEntry.67xrow8BHnKbKozv]{介绍 Introduction}，看看如何开始故事。也请确保事先与你的玩家分享@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{创造你的英雄 Creating Your Hero}日志里的内容！

  • 如果你还没有组建好一支队伍，单人冒险@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-beginner-box.adventures.5KQWZpnK28WGytl]{海贼王的财宝 Pirate King's Plunder}可以作为一个很好的开始，让你轻松熟悉游戏。

文件夹

虽然本模组的大部分内容是为GM设计的，但其中仍有许多对玩家有用的信息和指导。每个文件夹都有颜色，以表示谁可以看到其内容。如果文件夹是红色的，那么所有玩家都可以看到。如果文件夹没有指定颜色，那么它只包含参考资料（如致谢名单或法律信息）。如果文件夹是绿色的，那么它包含的信息只对GM可见。

Informational Boxes.name: 信息框 Informational Boxes
Informational Boxes.text:
为了保持井然有序，日志内容经过一定的格式化排版。以下是各个格式的示例：

这是一个旁白框。在《奥塔里地下的威胁》的冒险中，这样的文本通常需要 DM 向玩家大声朗读。

Foundry VTT建议

这是最常用的提示之一；看起来像这样的信息框会为您提供有关使用 Foundry VTT 功能的提示。

遭遇

这种信息框包含可能对玩家角色造成危险的生物或威胁的信息，以及有关如何主持遭遇的建议。通常，信息框的顶部会包含指向相关角色的动态链接，以便您快速查看角色数据或进行投骰。

财宝

财宝信息框包含用于奖励玩家的特殊物品或金币，通常出现在遭遇完成之后。您会发现，大多数这样的信息框都链接到一种称为“战利品”的特殊类型的角色表格，其中包含所有特殊物品和货币。

Differences.name: 不同点
Differences.text:
Pathfinder 新手包简化了部分游戏规则，使新玩家更容易上手。

然而，无论是新手还是老手玩家，Foundry Virtual Tabletop 的 Pathfinder 游戏系统都会通过自动化许多游戏机制来简化游戏流程。

在转换这些内容时，我们意识到，使用新手包的简化规则会在某种程度上使新用户的游戏体验变得更加复杂，因为他们会发现系统正在自动使用他们从未听说过的规则。此外，我们也认为，当系统的自动化能够替代运行游戏时的繁琐细节时，规则的简化并非必要。

为了给 DM 和玩家提供最佳的游戏体验，我们决定尝试与 Pathfinder 游戏系统进行整合，并在必要时对新手包的原始文本进行修订，以创建一个连贯统一的游戏体验。因此，日志条目的内容并不会与 PDF 或实体书版的新手包的 DM 指南或英雄手册中概述的规则文本完全一致。如果您希望使用新手包的简化规则，本模组也提供了这些文本的 PDF 副本。

《奥塔里地下的威胁》和《海盗王的财宝》的冒险文本保持不变，但其中指导用户如何使用 Foundry VTT 的 Pathfinder 游戏系统的部分除外。

Audio and Playlists.name: 音频和播放列表 Audio and Playlists
Audio and Playlists.text:
这个付费模组包括由Syrinscape提供的精美音频，其中包括一些已在场景关键位置预设好的环境音源。

环境声音

环境声音被放置在场景中；当玩家的指示物进入其范围内时，将自动播放音频。它们可用于营造更具沉浸感的氛围背景音，而无需DM逐一管理。

通常会有具体的提示，说明当你的玩家第一次遇到环境音时该如何处理。但你需要知道环境音何时会播放，并在适当的时候通过右键单击将其禁用。

你知道吗？

右侧边栏中的“播放列表”分页，可以通过右键单击其图标（音符图标）弹出独立窗口，方便使用。

播放列表

其他声音都在播放列表中，你可以精确控制它们在何时何地播放，以最佳方式炒热气氛，为玩家提供音频提示或响应游戏内事件。

作为DM，你应该花一些时间熟悉播放列表选项卡中可用的音频，以便了解在冒险中的哪些情况下可以使用哪些音频。下面还提供了使用播放列表的额外提示。

本模组中的播放列表

知识库：播放列表

此模块中预设的播放列表包括以下曲目及其预设的用途：

环境音

  • 探索循环 Exploration Loops (多音频同时播放) - 包含循环音频，为探索行动增加一些氛围。它们可以单独播放，但单击播放列表会同时激活所有三个音频。有地下微弱低音嗡鸣声的环境音、周期性的湿漏滴（令人联想到海边的洞穴），以及啮齿动物的叽叽喳喳和刮擦声。
  • 第一层探索环境音 Floor 1 Exploration Ambience - 此播放列表仅包含一个音频，是一个用于地下探索的钢琴音乐循环，最好与其他环境音乐播放列表一起使用。
  • 第二层探索环境音 Floor 2 Exploration Ambience - 此播放列表仅包含一个循环嗡鸣声，旨在传达探索更深的地下洞穴的感觉。最好与其他环境音乐播放列表一起使用。
  • 第二层美人鱼喷泉 Floor 2 Mermaid Fountain - 一个微弱的不祥嗡嗡声和放大的流水声，当与现场的水流环境声混合使用时，应为玩家提供一个清晰的音频提示，表明喷泉可能出现了问题，而且很危险。
  • 第二层浸水的路口 Floor 2 Soggy Crossroads - 当玩家闯过二楼的路障并且接近水源时，应该使用这个播放列表。它将一楼微弱的探索钢琴声和强烈的水声混合在一起。
  • 奥塔里渔场 Otari Fishery - 这个音轨呈现出一个繁忙而热闹的场所：有人在喝酒、玩游戏，还有工人的声音。当玩家与塔米莉交谈时，应该使用它。
  • 奥塔里码头 Otari Wharf - 海鸟和海浪的混合，将玩家的想象力带到海滨小镇中。
  • 音板循环 Soundboard Loops - 这是一个包含循环音轨的声音板，可以用于触发特定的音效。例如，在与煤渣鼠的遭遇中，您可能希望播放“一切都在燃烧 Everything is Fire”音轨，直到煤渣鼠被击败；或者当您的玩家闯过第一个路障向北探索时，您可能希望开始播放“邪恶的死者 The Malevolent Dead”。

Sound Effects 音效

  • 路障 Barricades - 这些是玩家拆除路障时的音效；如果玩家错过听到它们，可以从这个列表重播。
  • 巨龙音板 Dragon Soundboard - 玩家进入蘑菇洞穴时，这些音效可以让您提示玩家龙的存在，并在战斗开始时播放龙的攻击或受伤的声音。
  • 煤渣鼠 The Cinder Rat - 当煤渣鼠从@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.7Ko4GJeI1K3Vy1Xp]{区域14：混乱的元素 Area 14: Elements of Chaos}中的球体中爆出时播放的声效。

Creating Your Hero.name: 创建你的角色 Creating Your Hero

Character Creation.name: 创建角色 Character Creation
Character Creation.text:
你准备好投身于冒险了吗？你需要做的第一件事就是创建你的英雄！由你来想象英雄的过往经历、性格与世界观——这将为你在游戏中的角色扮演搭好舞台。

角色创建

PF2E系统维基：制作PC @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{开拓者协会}

角色卡

第一步是拿到你的角色卡。如果你要创建新角色，你的GM可以在侧边栏的角色标签页中点击“Create Actor”为你创建新的角色卡。他们也需要将该角色分配给你，这可以通过右键点击它，并在“Configure Permissions”中给予你“Owner”权限来完成。

如果你需要一些指导来学习如何阅读与使用《开拓者第二版》系统的角色卡，你可以使用上方链接的系统维基来熟悉它提供的字段与标签页，以及一些关于扮演特定职业的具体建议。

实用工具

在创建角色期间，或之后当你为英雄升级时，你会把动作、专长、物品、法术以及其他特性添加到你的角色卡上。系统已为你包含了所有这些数据——你只需要把它应用到你的角色上！

在侧边栏的“compendiums”标签页底部，有一个标为“Compendium Browser”的按钮。点击后会打开一个界面，让你搜索并筛选系统中包含的所有规则内容。你可以用它快速找到想选择的特性，然后把它们从这个窗口拖到你的角色卡上。就是这么简单！

角色创建规则

在某些地方，《开拓者新手包》PDF中提供的规则或角色选项，可能与这些日志页面或PF2E系统中使用的有所不同。这是因为新手包为了让系统更容易学习，呈现了一套更简化、更精炼的规则。

由于虚拟桌面能够处理许多学习新游戏系统机制时带来的细枝末节与复杂性，我们选择遵循《开拓者第二版核心规则书》中概述的完整规则。

不过，如果你想改用新手包PDF中的那些规则，也欢迎你回去参考。如果你不确定该看哪里，务必询问你的GM。一旦你掌握了规则，你就可以使用这里的步骤来引导你完成流程！

开拓者协会

如果你打算为开拓者协会的有组织游戏运行《奥塔里地下的威胁》这一冒险，那么你在创建角色时使用哪个版本的规则就显得尤为重要。如果你还没有阅读过，请查阅 @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{开拓者协会} 日志页面以了解更多。



原文:

Are you ready to dive into adventure? The first thing you need to do is create your hero! It's up to you to imagine your hero's past experiences, personality, and worldview- this will set the stage for your roleplay during the game.

Character Creation

PF2E System Wiki: Making a PC @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{Pathfinder Society}

Character Sheets

The first step is getting your hands on your character sheet. If you're making new characters, your GM can create new sheets for you by clicking "Create Actor" on the actors tab of the sidebar. They'll need to assign the actor to you as well, which can be done by right-clicking on it and giving you the "Owner" permission under "Configure Permissions".

If you could use some guidance on learning to read and use the Pathfinder Second Edition system's character sheets, you can use the system's wiki linked above to familiarise yourself with the fields and tabs it has to offer, as well as some specific advice for playing certain classes.

Useful Tools

During character creation, or later on as you level up your hero, you're going to be adding actions, feats, items, spells, and other features to your character sheet. The system includes all of this data for you- you need only apply it to your character!

On the "compendiums" tab of your sidebar, at the bottom, there is a button labelled "Compendium Browser". When clicked, this opens an interface which allows you to search and filter through all of the rules content included in the system. You can use this to quickly find the features you'd like to choose, and then drag them from this window onto your character sheet. It's as simple as that!

Character Creation Rules

In some places, the rules or character options presented in the Pathfinder Beginner Box PDF may differ from those this used in these journal pages or in the PF2E system. This is because the Beginner Box presents a simplified and streamlined set of rules in the interest of making the system a little easier to learn.

Because a virtual tabletop handles a lot of the minutia and complexity that comes from learning the mechanics of a new game system, we've chosen to stick to the full rules as outlined in the Pathfinder Second Edition Core Rulebook.

However, you're welcome to refer back to the Beginner Box PDF if you would like to play with those rules instead. If you aren't sure where you should be looking, make sure that you ask your GM. Once you have the rules in hand, you can use the steps here to guide your process!

Pathfinder Society

If you're planning on running the adventure Menace Under Otari for Pathfinder Society organised play, it becomes especially important that you take into account which version of the rules you use to create your characters. If you haven't already, consult the @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{Pathfinder Society} journal page to find out more.

Step By Step.name: 一步一步来 Step By Step
Step By Step.text:
这里按建议顺序列出了创建角色的步骤，引导你完成英雄人生故事的早期阶段，但你也可以按自己喜欢的任何顺序完成它们。例如，你可能在决定这位法师是精灵之前，就已经知道自己想玩一名法师！

每一步都会指示你在角色卡上填写相应栏位。角色卡被设计成便于你在实际游玩时使用，但创建英雄的顺序不同，因此在进行创建角色流程时，你会在角色卡上来回切换。此外，角色卡包含你可能需要的每一个栏位，尽管并非所有英雄都会在每个栏位里都有内容。如果你角色卡上的某个栏位不适用于你的英雄，就把该栏位留空即可。

步骤 1：创建概念

你想扮演怎样的英雄？这个问题的答案可能简单到“一个勇敢的战士”，也可能复杂到“精灵流浪者的孩子，但在一座由人类主导的城市中长大，并奉萨伦瑞——太阳女神——为信仰”。

思考你英雄的个性，写下几条关于其过往的细节，并想想他们为何要去冒险。

步骤 2：属性调整值

在你开始深入做出选择之前，你需要先熟悉@UUID[.FovwsmUiYCMzsfVm]{Attributes}。属性调整值会影响你的角色几乎做的每一件事，因此现在正是确定哪些属性对你的英雄最重要的好时机。

目前，你的属性调整值从 +0 开始，但它们会随着你完成本手册的各个步骤而提高。你应当在进行过程中在角色卡上记录它们。每当你的一项选择给予你一次能力提升时，你就将该能力的调整值提高 +1。

步骤 3：选择族裔

你的英雄是坚韧的矮人、优雅的精灵，还是多才多艺的人类？

你的角色的族裔决定他们将哪些人视作同族：无论是多样且雄心勃勃的人类、隐居但活力十足的精灵，还是重传统且以家族为重的矮人。你的角色的族裔可能是其身份认同的关键部分，塑造他们看待世界的方式，并帮助他们在其中找到自己的位置——或找到他们正在反抗的事物！

要了解下方三个推荐起始族裔的更多信息，点击它们的名称以打开相关的日志讲义。

你也可以通过阅读该族裔的日志页面，进一步了解其机制层面的影响。

一旦选定，你的族裔会自动应用大多数特性或加值，但它无法替你做选择！在继续之前，确保你已经：

  • 将你的族裔添加到你的角色卡上。
  • 分配你的自由属性提升，并决定是否采用自愿缺陷。
  • 选择一个传承：可以从推荐选项列表中选择，或从系统中其他可用传承中选择。
  • 选择一个族裔专长，它代表你的英雄在年幼时学会的一项能力。

步骤 4：选择背景

你的英雄的背景可能代表其成长经历、他们自幼一直在磨练的天赋，或他们成为冒险者之前生活中的另一个面向。你的英雄的背景会提高其属性调整值，并赋予一项特殊能力。

以下背景适用于各种不同角色的广泛范围，但在多种《探路者第二版》出版物中还有更多可用背景，并可在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pf2e-macros.s2sa8lo9dcIA6UGe]{Compendium Browser}中找到。你只需将它们拖到你的角色卡上即可添加。

@Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.CAjQrHZZbALE7Qjy]{Acolyte} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.9lVw1JGl5ser6626]{Criminal} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.IObZEUz8wneEMgR3]{Deckhand} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.SOmJyAtPOokesZoe]{Farmhand} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.o1lhSKOpKPamTITI]{Bookkeeper} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.r0kYIbN06Cv8eNG3]{Warrior}

步骤 5：选择职业

职业会赋予你的英雄一套英雄能力，并决定他们在战斗中的职责。每个职业还提供进一步的选项，让你决定自己想成为哪种英雄！你会扮演虔诚的牧师、强大的战士、狡猾的游荡者，还是勤学的法师？

要了解你的角色可能选择的一些职业，请点击下方链接。你也可以阅读@UUID[.NpFrnwOBAFYATF1A]{Choosing a Class}日志页面，以了解职业的作用。

与族裔一样，阅读你所选职业的细节非常重要，以确保你不会忘记把任何加值添加到角色卡上。

  • 根据你的职业选择，你会获得一次对关键属性的能力提升——牧师为感知，战士为力量或敏捷，游荡者为敏捷，法师为智力。
  • 你的职业还决定你起始拥有多少@UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.nQgj1rvfQhLtlspj]{技能}与语言，除去你智力调整值所给予的那些（它们会在最后一步加入，即@UUID[.BEtnPZeVzTcELPDf]{完成你的英雄}）。
  • 某些职业，如游荡者，可能会在 1 等级时给予你一个专长。
  • 如果你是牧师，别忘了选择你的@UUID[.FfuaIRGpgOEd8Jwr]{Deities}！

步骤 6：购买装备

你的角色从 1 等级开始，拥有 15 gold pieces 可用于购买基础装备。要查看你的角色受训于哪些武器与护甲，请前往角色卡的技能分页，并查看你的熟练项。

如果你已知道想购买哪些物品，或想要浏览，你可以打开侧边栏“Compendiums”分页底部的 Compendium Browser 并在那里搜索，或查阅《探路者核心规则书》。

职业套装

如果你想快速开始，可以考虑选择以下“职业套装”之一，它们会迅速为你的职业提供一套用途广泛的装备。要这样做，只需将其中一个拖到你的物品栏中。

其中一些职业套装会给你一些选择，比如战士偏好的武器——你可以阅读它们的描述，以获得更多背景说明。

@UUID[Item.BCSVb3hhyFw4ppus]{牧师装备} @UUID[Item.RwtG2QiqkxWBVHOY]{战士装备} @UUID[Item.Xo6PWwcrCh8CLJe0]{游荡者装备} @UUID[Item.nVpkugq6jfoamhve]{法师装备}

步骤 7：完成你的英雄

创建英雄的最后一步，是根据你在流程中所做的选择来计算他们的各项数据。相关建议在下一页中概述——@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.BEtnPZeVzTcELPDf]{完成你的英雄}



原文:

The steps of character creation are presented here in a suggested order, guiding you through the early stages of your hero’s life story, but you can complete them in whatever order you prefer. For instance, you might know you want to play a wizard before you decide that wizard will be an elf!

Each step instructs you to fill out fields on your character sheet. The character sheet is designed to be easy to use when you’re actually playing the game, but creating a hero happens in a different order, so you’ll move back and forth through the character sheet as you go through the character creation process. Additionally, the character sheet includes every field you might need, even though not all heroes will have something to put in each field. If a field on your character sheet is not applicable to your hero, just leave that field blank.

Step 1: Create a Concept

What sort of hero do you want to play? The answer to this question might be as simple as “a brave warrior,” or as complicated as “the child of elven wanderers, but raised in a city dominated by humans and devoted to Sarenrae, goddess of the sun.”

Consider your hero’s personality, write out a few details about their past, and think about why they adventure.

Step 2: Attribute Modifiers

Before you dive into making choices, you need to familiarise yourself with @UUID[.FovwsmUiYCMzsfVm]{Attributes}. Attribute modifiers affect nearly everything your character does, and so this is a good time to identify which attributes will be most important to your hero.

For now, your attribute modifiers start at +0, but they will be increased as you progress throughout the steps of this handout. You should keep track of them on your character sheet as you go. Each time one of your choices gives you an Ability Boost, you increase the ability modifier by +1.

Step 3: Select an Ancestry

Is your hero a sturdy dwarf, a graceful elf, or a versatile human?

Your character's ancestry determines which people they call their own, whether that's diverse and ambitious humans, insular but vivacious elves, or traditionalist and family-focused dwarves. Your character's ancestry might be a key part of their identity, shape how they see the world, and help them find their place in it- or what they're rebelling against!

To find out more about the three recommended starting ancestries below, click on their name to open up a journal handout about them.

You can also learn more about the mechanical implications of your ancestry by reading the Ancestry's journal page.

Once chosen, your Ancestry will automatically apply most features or bonuses, but it can't make your choices for you! Before you continue, make sure that you:

  • Add your ancestry to your character sheet.
  • Assign your free attribute boosts and decide if you are taking a Voluntary Flaw.
  • Select a heritage, either from the list of recommended options or one of the other available heritages in the system.
  • Choose an Ancestry Feat, which represents an ability your hero learned at an early age.

Step 4: Pick a Background

Your hero's background might represent their upbringing, an aptitude they've been honing since their youth, or another aspect of their life before they became an adventurer. Your hero's background improves their attribute modifiers and grants a special ability.

The following backgrounds are good choices for a wide range of different characters, but many more are available in various Pathfinder Second Edition publications, and can be found in the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pf2e-macros.s2sa8lo9dcIA6UGe]{Compendium Browser}. You can add them to your character sheet simply by dragging them onto it.

@Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.CAjQrHZZbALE7Qjy]{Acolyte} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.9lVw1JGl5ser6626]{Criminal} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.IObZEUz8wneEMgR3]{Deckhand} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.SOmJyAtPOokesZoe]{Farmhand} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.o1lhSKOpKPamTITI]{Bookkeeper} @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.r0kYIbN06Cv8eNG3]{Warrior}

Step 5: Choose a Class

A class gives your hero a suite of heroic abilities and determines their role in a fight. Each class provides further options that let you decide what type of hero you want to be! Will you play a devoted cleric, a mighty fighter, a cunning rogue, or a studious wizard?

To learn more about some of the classes your character might be, click on the links below. You can also read the@UUID[.NpFrnwOBAFYATF1A]{Choosing a Class} journal page to learn more about what classes do.

Just as with Ancestry, it's very important that you read the details of your class to make sure you don't forget to add any of the bonuses to your sheet.

  • Depending on your class choice, you'll get an ability boost to your key attribute— Wisdom for Clerics, Strength or Dexterity for fighters, Dexterity for Rogues, and Intelligence for Wizards.
  • Your class also determines how many @UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.nQgj1rvfQhLtlspj]{Skills} and languages you start with, in addition to those granted by your intelligence modifier (which will be added in the final step, @UUID[.BEtnPZeVzTcELPDf]{Finishing your Hero}).
  • Some classes, like Rogue, might grant you a feat at level one.
  • If you're a cleric, don't forget to choose your @UUID[.FfuaIRGpgOEd8Jwr]{Deities}!

Step 6: Buy Equipment

Your character starts at first level with 15 gold pieces to spend on basic equipment. To check which weapons and armour your character is trained in, navigate to the Skills tab of your character sheet and look at your proficiencies.

If you know which items you'd like to buy or would like to browse, you can open the Compendium Browser at the bottom of the Compendiums tab of your sidebar and search for them there, or consult a copy of the Pathfinder Core Rulebook.

Class Kits

If you want to start quickly, consider choosing one of the following "class kits", which will quickly give you a broadly useful set of equipment for your class. To do so, simply drag one to your inventory.

Some of these class kits give you a few choices, such as which weapons you might favor as a fighter- you can read their descriptions for additional context.

@UUID[Item.BCSVb3hhyFw4ppus]{Cleric Equipment} @UUID[Item.RwtG2QiqkxWBVHOY]{Fighter Equipment} @UUID[Item.Xo6PWwcrCh8CLJe0]{Rogue Equipment} @UUID[Item.nVpkugq6jfoamhve]{Wizard Equipment}

Step 7: Finish Your Hero

The last step in creating your hero is to calculate their statistics based on the choices you’ve made in the process. That advice is outlined in the next page- @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.BEtnPZeVzTcELPDf]{Finishing your Hero}

Pregenerated Heroes.name: 预设英雄 Pregenerated Heroes
Pregenerated Heroes.text:
入门盒子被设计为与以下四位标志性角色一起使用，其中任何一位都非常适合新玩家，或是想直接投入行动的玩家：

你可以在屏幕右侧边栏的角色（actors）标签页下的“英雄”中找到他们。

要进一步了解如何扮演这些标志性角色，或帮助你决定要扮演哪一位，你可以阅读各个职业的描述；其末尾会以摘要形式介绍他们的背景故事。

其他角色

如果你想扩大你桌上的选择，Iconics 汇编中任何等级 1 的英雄都很合适。不过，其中一些角色可能包含比入门盒子所收录内容更复杂的职业或特性。

此外，你也可以随时从零开始创建你自己的英雄。在这种情况下，请查阅 @UUID[.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{创建角色} 日志页面。你需要为这些英雄提供你自己的指示物（token），或从本世界中包含的数个通用指示物中选择一个。你的 GM 可以在模组文件中找到它们，位置在：

pf2e-beginner-box/assets/portraits-heroes



原文:

The Beginner Box was designed for use with the following four iconic characters, any of which would be a great choice for new players or those who want to jump straight into the action:

You can find them under "Heroes" on the actors tab of the sidebar on the right hand side of your screen.

To learn more about how to play the iconic characters, or to help you decide which one to play, you can read the descriptions of each class, which finishes with a summary of their backstory.

Other Characters

If you want to expand the choices at your table, any of the level 1 heroes from the Iconics compendium would serve well. However, some of them may feature more complicated classes or features than those included in the Beginner Box.

In addition, you can always make your own heroes from scratch. In that case, consult the @UUID[.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{Character Creation} journal page. You'll need to provide your own tokens for these heroes, or choose from one of the several generic tokens included with this world. Your GM can find them inside of the module files, at:

pf2e-beginner-box/assets/portraits-heroes

Leveling Up.name: 升级 Leveling Up
Leveling Up.text:
当你踏上冒险、击败对手并解决挑战时，你的角色将获得经验值（XP）。当你获得XP时，将其记录在你的角色卡上。

当你达到1,000 XP时，你获得一个等级！将你的等级提高1，并从你当前的XP中减去1,000 XP。（你可以保留任何多余的XP，用于你的下一个等级！）然后查阅你的职业条目，了解你因升级而获得的全部好处。

在Foundry中升级

@JournalEntry[KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{创建你的角色}

提高你的等级

当你升级时，首先在你的角色卡上提高你的等级。Foundry的《开拓者第二版》系统会根据你的职业自动为你添加若干特性与能力。这个列表并不完整，而且它无法替你做出诸如技能提升或专长选择之类的决定，但它应当能帮你节省一些时间！

做出选择

如果你进入你的专长标签页，你应该会看到出现了一些栏位。例如，如果你将等级提升到2，你会看到一个用于2级职业专长的栏位。这些专长栏位有助于提示你在何时何地需要做出选择。要填入它们，你可以使用资料库浏览器在你的职业与等级可用的专长之间进行选择，如上方链接的@JournalEntry[KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{创建你的角色}日志条目中所述。做出选择后，只需将其从资料库浏览器拖入你空的专长栏位中。

同样地，你也可以使用资料库浏览器来选择新法术，或寻找任何未被自动添加到你角色卡上的其他特性。



原文:

As you go on adventures, defeat opponents, and solve challenges, your character will gain Experience Points (XP). Keep track of your XP on your character sheet as you earn it.

Once you’ve reached 1,000 XP, you gain a level! Increase your level by 1 and subtract 1,000 XP from your current XP. (You get to keep any extra XP toward your next level!) Then consult your class entry to learn all the benefits you gained from leveling up.

Leveling Up In Foundry

@JournalEntry[KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{Creating Your Hero}

Increasing your level

When you level up, first, increase your level on your character sheet. The Pathfinder Second Edition system for Foundry will automatically add several features and abilities for you based on your class. This list isn't definitive, and it can't make choices like skill increases or feats for you, but it should help save you some time!

Making Choices

If you navigate to your feats tab, you should see that some slots have appeared. For instance, if you level to 2, you will see a slot for your level 2 class feat appear. These feat slots can be helpful for communicating where and when you have to make a choice. To fill them, you can use the Compendium Browser to choose between the feats that are available for your class and level, as explained in the @JournalEntry[KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{Creating Your Hero} journal entry linked above. Once you've made your choice, just drag it from the Compendium Browser into your empty feat slot.

Similarly, you can also use the Compendium Browser to choose new spells, or find any other features which weren't automatically added to your sheet.

Finishing your Hero.name: 完成你的英雄 Finishing your Hero
Finishing your Hero.text:
你已经确定了你英雄的主要特征。现在是时候为其添加最后的润色了！

这份讲义包含一次最终检查，以确保你没有遗漏任何细节，同时也列出了一些收尾事项，例如你英雄的名字与个性。你的英雄是正义的捍卫者，还是只要能付账单就为任何人卖命的佣兵？

属性值

既然你已经完成了创建角色的所有选择，你应该再查看一次你的 @UUID[.FovwsmUiYCMzsfVm]{属性值}，以确保你没有忘记选择任何属性提升。

专长

同样地，你的族裔或职业可能授予了你一些专长。检查你角色卡上的对应标签页——是否有任何空的专长栏位可以填入？

技能

你英雄的智力加值决定了他们懂得多少技能，此外还包括他们从背景与职业获得的技能。从完整的 @UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.nQgj1rvfQhLtlspj]{技能} 列表中，选择数量等于你英雄智力调整值的技能，使其成为受训技能。通过在你角色卡的技能标签页上点击该技能的熟练度按钮，将它们标记为受训。

姓名与代词

别忘了为你的英雄取名并决定他们使用的代词——所有性别或无性别的角色都同样可能成为冒险者。将你英雄的姓名与代词记录在角色卡顶部区域。如果你愿意，你也可以加入一张你英雄外貌的图片，或在外貌描述区域写下他们的样貌。



原文:

You’ve identified the main aspects of your hero. Now it’s time to add the finishing touches!

This handout constitutes a final check to make sure you didn't forget any last details, as well as a list of finishing touches, like your hero’s name and personality. Is your hero a champion of justice, or a sellsword who works for anyone who can pay the bills?

Ability Scores

Now that you've made all of your choices as part of character creation, you should take another look at your @UUID[.FovwsmUiYCMzsfVm]{Ability Scores} scores to make sure you haven't forgotten to select any of your boosts.

Feats

Similarly, your ancestry or class might have granted you some feats. Check the associated tab in your character sheet- are there any empty feat slots you can fill?

Skills

Your hero’s Intelligence bonus determines how many skills they know, in addition to those they gained from their background and class. From the full list of @UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.nQgj1rvfQhLtlspj]{Skills}, choose a number of skills equal to your hero’s Intelligence modifier to become trained in. Mark them as trained by clicking on the skill's proficiency button on the Skills tab of your character sheet.

Name and Pronouns

Don't forget to name your hero and decide on their pronouns- characters of all genders or no gender are equally likely to become adventurers. Record your hero's name and pronouns in the top section of your character sheet. If you'd like, you can also include a picture of your hero's appearance or write a description of what they look like section.

Human.text:
如同格拉利昂上的任何族群一样难以预测且多姿多彩，人类拥有非凡的动力，以及忍耐与扩张的能力。尽管在人类崛起并占据显赫地位之前，许多文明早已繁荣兴盛，但在人类的历史进程中，他们既建立过最伟大也建立过最令人发指的社会。如今，他们是世界各地诸国中人口最多的族群。

扮演人类

将 @Compendium[pf2e.ancestries.IiG7DgeLWYrSNXuX]{Human} 族裔拖拽到你的角色卡上以进行选择。这将自动应用与人类族裔相关的若干特性到你的角色上，其中一些会在此处说明。

生命值：人类不如矮人那般结实，也不如精灵那般脆弱。你从你的族裔获得 8 点生命值。

速度：人类的移动速度与大多数族裔相当。你从你的族裔获得 25 尺速度。

名字

不同于许多族裔文化通常遵循特定传统与共同历史，人类的多样性带来了近乎无限的名字选择。人类的名字如同他们的信仰与外貌一样多种多样。

人类传承

与世界上大多数族群一样，人类也有许多不同的类型。

每个传承都会提供反映你角色的过往、教育与经历的增益。如果你需要一些帮助，我们建议你选择以下传承之一。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.hFBwsVcSnNCJoimo]{多才多艺传承}
你体现了人类的雄心，并不断追求自我提升。
@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.zVf0Hlp5xG0Q7kmc]{技艺娴熟传承}
你的机敏使你能够学习种类繁多的技能。


原文:

As unpredictable and varied as any of Golarion's peoples, humans have exceptional drive and the capacity to endure and expand. Though many civilizations thrived before humanity rose to prominence, humans have built some of the greatest and most abhorrent societies throughout the course of history. Today they are the most populous people in realms around the world.

Playing a Human

Choose the @Compendium[pf2e.ancestries.IiG7DgeLWYrSNXuX]{Human} ancestry by dragging it onto your character sheet. This will automatically apply several of the features associated with the Human ancestry to your character, some of which are explained here.

Hit Points: Humans are not as sturdy as dwarves, nor as frail as elves. You have 8 hit points from your ancestry..

Speed: Humans move about as quickly as most ancestries. You have a speed of 25 from your ancestry.

Names

Unlike many ancestral cultures, which generally cleave to specific traditions and shared histories, humanity's diversity has resulted in a near-infinite set of names. Humans' names are as varied as their beliefs and appearances.

Human Heritages

Like for most folk in the world, there are many different kinds of humans.

Each heritage grants benefits which reflect your character's past, education, and experiences. If you need some help, we suggest you pick one of the following heritages.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.hFBwsVcSnNCJoimo]{Versatile Heritage}
You embody the ambition of humanity and constantly seek to better yourself.
@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.zVf0Hlp5xG0Q7kmc]{Skilled Heritage}
Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills.
Human.name: 人类 Human

Rogue.text:
凭借机智与迅捷的反应，你利用对手的失误，在最痛的地方下手。你追求刺激并磨练技艺，而且你很可能不太在意任何挡在你路上的法律。尽管每位游荡者都走着独特的道路，你们共同拥有的一点，是你们技能的广度与深度。

如果你想……就游玩游荡者

  • 潜近敌人以造成更多伤害。
  • 在不被看见的情况下偷窃东西。
  • 在多种技能上表现出色。
  • 在冒险中用诡计解决问题。

在战斗遭遇中……

你潜行移动，以便出其不意地抓住敌人。你是一件精密工具，相较于对付成群结队的士兵，你对抗强悍的首领或远处的施法者时更有用。

在探索时……

你潜行以抢得先机，并侦察危险或陷阱。你是极好的助力，因为你能解除陷阱、解开谜题，并预判危险。

标志性游荡者：梅瑞希尔

@Actor[czQ0MaZBu3BqMpce]{梅瑞希尔}

梅瑞希尔是一名精灵，她在人类之中以孤儿的身份长大。她是藏身船上偷渡的高手，把数十座城市当作家；当她的人类伙伴渐渐老去而她依旧年轻时，她就离开一个地方前往另一个地方。梅瑞希尔从未遇到过无法用刀子以某种方式解决的问题。但当刺杀并非最佳解法时，她就以惊人的敏捷与对小物件（例如开锁工具）的熟练来弥补。

梅瑞希尔的人生经历教会她要把握当下并尽情享受——你无法知道好时光何时会结束。她对自己的想法与情绪坦率而外露；尽管她总在路上，忙着策划最新一批轻松赚钱的计谋，但归根结底，她的所有计划都落在比所有人更快——要么脚下更快，要么她心爱的刀刃更快。她别无他求。



原文:

Using your wits and quick reactions, you take advantage of your opponents' missteps to strike where it hurts most. You seek thrills and test your skills, and you likely don’t care much for any laws that happen to get in your way. While every rogue follows a unique path, the one thing you all share is the breadth and depth of your skills.

Play a Rogue If You Want To...

  • Sneak up on foes to deal more damage.
  • Steal things without being seen.
  • Excel at a variety of skills.
  • Use trickery to solve problems during adventures.

During Combat Encounters...

You move about stealthily so you can catch foes unawares. You're a precision instrument, more useful against a tough boss or distant spellcaster than against rank-and-file soldiers.

While Exploring...

You sneak about to get the drop on foes and scout for danger or traps. You're a great asset, since you can disable traps, solve puzzles, and anticipate dangers.

The Iconic Rogue: Merisiel

@Actor[czQ0MaZBu3BqMpce]{Merisiel}

Merisiel is an elf who grew up as an orphan among humans. She is a master at stowing away on ships and has called dozens of cities home, leaving one place for another after her human companions grew old and she stayed young. Merisiel has never met a problem that couldn't be solved with a knife in one way or another. But when stabbing's not the best solution, she makes up for it by being incredibly agile and skilled with small objects, such as lockpicks.

Merisiel's life experiences have taught her to enjoy things in the moment and to their fullest-it's impossible to tell when the good times might end. She's open and expressive with her thoughts and emotions, and while she's always on the move and working on her latest batch of schemes for easy money, in the end all her plots come down to being faster than everyone else-either on her feet, or with her beloved blades. She wouldn't have it any other way.
Rogue.name: 游荡者 Rogue

Attribute Modifiers.name: 属性调整值 Attribute Modifiers
Attribute Modifiers.text:
属性调整值代表你英雄的原始潜力。它们会影响你角色卡上几乎所有其他数据。

力量

力量衡量你英雄的体能。力量会加到近战战斗中的攻击与伤害掷骰中。

敏捷

敏捷衡量灵活性、平衡感和反射神经。将敏捷加到使用远程武器的攻击掷骰、AC以及反射豁免掷骰中。

体质

体质衡量你英雄的总体健康与耐力。体质会加到你的生命值与强韧豁免掷骰中。

智力

智力衡量你英雄学习与推理的能力。高智力决定你英雄拥有多少技能。

感知

感知衡量你英雄的常识、警觉与直觉。感知会加到你的察觉与意志豁免掷骰中。

魅力

魅力衡量你英雄的个人吸引力与人格强度。高魅力能帮助你英雄影响他人。



原文:

Attribute modifiers represent your hero’s raw potential. They influence almost every other statistic on your character sheet.

Strength

Strength measures your hero’s physical power. Strength gets added to attack and damage rolls in hand-to-hand combat.

Dexterity

Dexterity measures agility, balance, and reflexes. Add Dexterity to attack rolls with ranged weapons, AC, and Reflex saving throws.

Constitution

Constitution measures your hero’s overall health and stamina. Constitution is added to your Hit Points and Fortitude saving throws.

Intelligence

Intelligence measures how well your hero can learn and reason. A high Intelligence determines how many skills your hero has.

Wisdom

Wisdom measures your hero’s common sense, awareness, and intuition. Wisdom is added to your Perception and Will saving throws.

Charisma

Charisma measures your hero’s personal magnetism and strength of personality. A high Charisma helps your hero influence other people.

Modifying Attributes.name: 调整属性 Modifying Attributes
Modifying Attributes.text:
属性提升

你在创建角色期间做出的若干选择会给予你一次属性提升。这意味着你应该将对应的属性调整值提高 1——例如从 +0 提高到 +1。

属性提升的来源

你会从你的族裔、你的背景以及你的职业获得属性提升。此外，你还会获得四次自由属性提升，你可以将其分配到任何你希望的地方（但不能在同一个能力值上分配两次）。

属性缺陷

除了提升之外，你的族裔也可能带有一个属性缺陷，例如矮人的魅力减值。你也可以选择将你的两个属性调整值各降低 1，以将第三个属性调整值提高 1，这称为“自愿缺陷”。由于此选择与你选择族裔是在同一时间做出的，因此它不能用于提升一个已经被你的族裔提高过的属性调整值。同样地，该缺陷也不能应用于一个已经被你的族裔降低的属性。

Foundry中的属性提升

PF2E 系统维基：制作PC

Foundry VTT 上的 PF2E 系统让你在构建角色时非常容易提高你的能力值。点击你角色卡上能力值旁边的编辑按钮，会打开一个窗口，允许你分配你的提升与缺陷。任何由你的族裔或你做出的其他选择自动获得的属性提升都会在此列出，而你可用的任何自由提升都可以从所有合法选项中进行选择。

此外，由于系统会自动为你计算并应用适当的调整值，你会看到你的掷骰已经计入你的属性调整值，而无需你自己把它们加起来。



原文:

Attribute Boosts

Several of the choices you make at character creation will grant you an Attribute Boost. This means you should increase the associated Attribute modifier by one- for instance, from +0 to +1.

Sources of Attribute Boosts

You gain attribute boosts from your Ancestry, your Background, and your Class. In addition, you gain four free attribute boosts that you can place anywhere you wish (although not twice in the same ability score).

Attribute Flaws

In addition to a boost, our Ancestry might also come with an Attribute Flaw, such as a malus to charisma for dwarves. You also have the option of reducing two of your attribute modifiers by 1 each to increase a third by 1, which is called a "Voluntary Flaw". Because this choice is made at the same time as your ancestry, it cannot be used to boost an attribute modifier which is already increased by your ancestry. Likewise, the flaw cannot be applied to an attribute which is already being reduced by your ancestry.

Attribute Boosts on Foundry

PF2E System Wiki: Making a PC

The PF2E system on Foundry VTT makes it very simple to increase your ability scores as you build your character. Clicking on the Edit button next to your ability scores on your character sheet opens up a window which allows you to allocate your boosts and flaws. Any attribute boosts that are automatically granted by your ancestry or other choices you have made will be listed here, and any free boosts you have available can be selected from all legal options.

In addition, because the system automatically calculates and applies the appropriate modifiers for you, you will see your rolls account for your attribute modifiers without you needing to add them up yourself.

Ability Scores in the Beginner Box.text:
入门箱中的属性值

PF2E 系统 Wiki：创建 PC @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{创建你的角色}

如“创建你的角色”讲义中所述，角色构建的具体细节在核心规则与入门箱中更为精简的规则之间可能会有很大差异。一如既往，如果有任何疑问，请务必询问你的 GM 你正在使用哪个版本的规则，并直接查阅规则书，以从来源处获取准确信息。Foundry 的《Pathfinder》第二版系统基于你在使用核心规则进行游戏这一前提运行。如果你在使用入门箱规则，这些日志讲义以及职业物品“详情”标签页中包含的信息可能不适用于你的角色。

入门箱精简核心规则的方式之一是移除“属性值”这一概念。取而代之的是，属性加值会直接提高你的调整值。因此，在某些情况下，入门箱可能会告诉你将你的属性调整值提高 1。这等同于一次属性加值，并且应当使你的属性值提高 2——这并不意味着你将属性值提高 1（例如从 10 提高到 11）。



原文:

Ability Scores in the Beginner Box

PF2E System Wiki: Making a PC @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{Creating Your Hero}

As mentioned in the Creating Your Hero handout, the specifics of character building can vary wildly between the core rules and the more streamlined rules included within the Beginner Box. As always, if there is any doubt, make sure to ask your GM which version of the rules you're using, and to consult the rulebooks directly to get the facts straight from the source. The Pathfinder Second Edition system for Foundry operates under the assumption you are playing with the core rules. If you are using the Beginner Box rules, the information contained within these journal handouts and the class item's "details" tab may not apply to your character.

One of the ways in which the Beginner Box streamlines the core rules is by removing the concept of an ability score. Instead, Ability Boosts directly increase your modifier. As such, at times, the Beginner Box might tell you to increase your ability modifier by one. This is equivalent to an Ability Boost and should increase your ability scores by 2- it does not mean that you increase your score by one (for example, from 10 to 11).
Ability Scores in the Beginner Box.name: 新手入门盒中的属性值 Ability Scores in the Beginner Box

Fighter.text:
无论你是为荣誉、贪婪、忠诚而战，还是仅仅为了战斗的刺激，你都是无可争议的武器与战斗技巧大师。你可能曾是骑士、佣兵或刀剑宗师。不管怎样，你已将武艺磨炼成一种艺术，用毁灭性的打击重创敌人。

如果你想要……就选择战士

  • 使用最大的武器——或者同时挥舞两把！
  • 在前线作战。
  • 迅速应对敌人的动作。
  • 穿戴最好的护甲并携带盾牌。
  • 恐吓或欺压你的对手。

在战斗遭遇中……

你以无与伦比的精准出击，并运用专门的战斗技巧。你站在盟友与敌人之间，攻击那些试图从你身边闯过去的敌人。

在探索时……

你保持防御以备战斗，并对隐藏的威胁保持警惕。你也会克服挡在路上的体能挑战：破门而入、搬开障碍、娴熟攀爬，并飞跃深坑。

标志性战士：瓦莱洛斯

@Actor[vcwqnXHkhzFhrt7O]{瓦莱洛斯}

瓦莱洛斯在与一位农夫之女的包办婚姻还有一个月就要举行时，意识到自己不想一辈子被拴在同一个地方。

他在半夜离开，只带着一套换洗衣物、一些食物，以及一根斧柄当作武器。他结识了一群佣兵，佣兵们教他如何挥剑以及穿戴沉重的护甲，但他善良的本性让他不愿为骗子、诈徒和虐待狂卖命。他成为了一名冒险者，自行决定要与谁作战，以及为何而战。

瓦莱洛斯友善而勇敢。尽管他有时会头脑发热、过于热血地投身战斗，但他很聪明，也不会让别人把他当成莽夫来看待。他忠于朋友，喜欢来上一大杯麦酒，并且在女性相伴时最为快活。



原文:

Whether you fight for honor, greed, loyalty, or simply the thrill of battle, you’re an undisputed master of weaponry and combat techniques. You might have been a knight, mercenary, or blade master. Whatever the case, you’ve honed your martial skills into an art form, performing devastating attacks on your enemies.

Play a Fighter If You Want To...

  • Use the biggest weapons— or two at once!
  • Fight on the front lines.
  • React quickly to enemy actions.
  • Wear the best armor and carry a shield.
  • Frighten or bully your foes.

During Combat Encounters...

You strike with unmatched accuracy and use specialized combat techniques. You stand between allies and enemies, attacking foes who try to get past.

While Exploring...

You keep up your defenses in preparation for combat and stay vigilant for hidden threats. You also overcome physical challenges in your way, breaking down doors, lifting obstacles, climbing adeptly, and leaping across pits.

The Iconic Fighter: Valeros

@Actor[vcwqnXHkhzFhrt7O]{Valeros}

Valeros was a month away from an arranged marriage to a farmer's daughter when he realized he didn't want to be tied down to one place for his entire life.

He left in the middle of the night with a change of clothes, some food, and an axe handle for a weapon. He fell in with mercenaries who taught him how to wield a sword and wear heavy armor, but his good heart made him not want to work for cheats, swindlers, and sadists. He became an adventurer, making his own decisions about whom he'd fight and why.

Valeros is friendly and brave. Though he sometimes gets in over his head and throws himself into battle with too much gusto, he's smart and doesn't let people talk to him like he's a brute. He is loyal to his friends, fond of a good mug of ale, and happiest when in the company of women.
Fighter.name: 战士 Fighter

Deities.name: 神祇 Deities
Deities.text:
任何角色都可以崇拜一位神祇，不过这个选择对@UUID[.MBKCQnQp9I44q46X]{牧师}而言最为重要。作为牧师，你所选择的神祇会给予你特定的益处。将你选择的神祇填写在你的角色卡上。

以下神祇是很好的起始选择。如果你想进一步了解其中任何一位，请点击他们的名字以获取更多信息。

@Compendium[pf2e.deities.JgqH3BhuEuA4Zyqs]{德丝娜}是掌管梦境、好运与旅行的蝴蝶女神。作为她的牧师，你宣誓援助同行旅者、探索新地点、通过艺术与歌声表达自我，并发现生命所能提供的一切。你也承诺绝不制造恐惧或绝望，也不从事偏执的行为。

又被称为“黎明之花”的@Compendium[pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{莎伦瑞}是治疗与太阳的女神。作为她的牧师，你宣誓保护盟友、为病者与伤者提供援助，并帮助悔改的生物寻求救赎。你承诺绝不制造亡灵、说谎，或未能击溃邪恶。

@Compendium[pf2e.deities.sZrdzh0ANQnZGXJb]{托拉格}是矮人族的锻造与防御之神。作为他的牧师，你宣誓光明磊落、言行正直，信守诺言，尊重熔炉，并为你的族人服务。你承诺绝不说谎、欺骗他人、故意制造劣质作品，或对你族人的敌人施以怜悯。



原文:

Any character can worship a deity, though the choice is most important for @UUID[.MBKCQnQp9I44q46X]{Clerics}. As a cleric, the deity you choose gives you specific benefits. Enter your choice of deity onto your character sheet.

The following deities are good choices to start with. If you'd like to learn more about any of them, click on their name for more information.

@Compendium[pf2e.deities.JgqH3BhuEuA4Zyqs]{Desna} is the butterfly goddess of dreams, luck, and travel. As her cleric, you swear to aid fellow travelers, explore new places, express yourself through art and song, and find what life has to offer. You also promise never to cause fear or despair or engage in bigoted behavior.

Also known as the Dawnflower, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae} is the goddess of healing and the sun. As her cleric, you swear to protect allies, provide aid to the sick and wounded, and help repentant creatures seek redemption. You promise never to create undead, lie, or fail to strike down evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.deities.sZrdzh0ANQnZGXJb]{Torag} is the dwarven god of crafting and defense. As his cleric, you swear to be honorable and forthright, keep your word, respect the forge, and serve your people. You promise never to tell lies, cheat someone, intentionally create inferior works, or show mercy to the enemies of your people.

Choosing an Ancestry.name: 选择一种族裔 Choosing an Ancestry
Choosing an Ancestry.text:
本日志的其他页面对三种最具代表性的可用族裔做了简要概述。你可以自行决定要扮演这三者之一，或《Pathfinder Second Edition》中可用的任何其他族裔。

一旦做出选择，你需要将其应用到你的角色上。你可以点击角色卡中“族裔”字段旁的 + 图标，并在其中的选项里进行选择。你也可以点击列表中的某个族裔，以了解其所带来的规则层面的增益与劣势。

族裔增益

当你选择一个族裔时，你的角色卡会自动填入该族裔授予的基础特性与增益。其他增益可能需要你在数个选项中做出选择。

族裔决定你英雄的速度、体型以及初始生命值。它们通常也会给予语言。

感官

一些族裔拥有超自然的感官，例如在黑暗中视物的能力。如果你的族裔给予你此类特性，它应当会自动出现在角色卡的主标签页中。注意，一些传承也可以改变或提升这些感官的敏锐度。

属性提升

每个族裔都会提供由固定能力提升、自由能力提升组成的组合，有时还会提供能力缺陷，用以体现该族裔的基础能力。关于如何管理能力提升的方法，已在@UUID[.lygt82lIvFJVGsUA]{调整能力数值}日志页面中说明。

传承

在你选择一个族裔后，你还要从该族裔的传承中选择一个，以进一步扩展你角色的起源与能力。你只能拥有一个传承，并且之后不能更改你的选择。

你可以用与选择族裔相同的方式选择一个传承，或者从本日志相关页面中为每个族裔详细列出的推荐选项中选择其一。无论哪种方式，都请务必阅读你的传承描述，以便你理解它为你提供了哪些增益。

有些传承可由任何族裔的成员选取。这些被称为通用传承。例如，任何族裔的成员都可能天生在血脉中带有些许邪魔之血，因此提夫林就是一种通用传承。除传承的其他增益外，通用传承还会在你选择族裔专长时提供更为扩展的可选项池。

族裔专长

每位英雄在第1等级都会选择一个族裔专长。你可以在“特性”标签页中、族裔专长标题下找到你的专长栏位。那里应当有一个空栏位，你可以用两种方式填入。你可以将一个族裔专长拖入该栏位以选择它，或者点击放大镜图标打开资料库浏览器，其中带有一些预先设置好的实用筛选条件。

注意，如果你选择了通用传承，你也可能可以从你的传承以及你的族裔中选择专长。



原文:

The other pages of this journal offer a brief overview of three of the most iconic ancestries available. It's up to you whether you'd like to play as one of those three, or any of the other ancestries that are available in Pathfinder Second Edition.

Once you've made your choice, you need to apply it to your character. You can do this by clicking on the + icon near the Ancestry field of your character sheet and choosing it from the options there. You can also click on one of the Ancestries in the list to learn more about the mechanical benefits and drawbacks it applies.

Ancestry Benefits

When you choose an ancestry, your character sheet will automatically be populated with the basic features and benefits granted by your ancestry. Other benefits may require you to make a choice between several options.

Ancestries determine your hero's Speed, Size, and starting Hit Points. They also usually grant languages.

Senses

Some ancestries have supernatural senses, such as the ability to see in the dark. If your ancestry grants you such a feature, it should appear on the main tab of your character sheet automatically. Note that some heritages can modify or improve the acuity of these senses, too.

Ability Boosts

Each ancestry provides a combination of set Ability Boosts, free Ability Boosts, and sometimes Ability Flaws which represent that ancestry's basic capabilities. The ways in which Ability Boosts are managed are outlined in the @UUID[.lygt82lIvFJVGsUA]{Modifying Ability Scores} journal page.

Heritages

After you've chosen an Ancestry, you'll also choose one of the ancestry's heritages, which expand on your character's origins and abilities. You can only have one Heritage, and you can't change your choice later.

You can choose a heritage in the same way that you chose your ancestry, or you can take one of the recommended options for each ancestry which are detailed in the associated pages of this journal. Either way, make sure to read the description of your heritage so that you understand which benefits it is providing to you.

Some heritages can be taken by members of any Ancestry. These are called Versatile Heritages. For instance, a member of any ancestry could be born with traces of fiendish blood in their veins, and so Tieflings are a versatile heritage. As well as the other benefits of a Heritage, a Versatile Heritage also offers you an expanded pool of options when choosing Ancestry Feats.

Ancestry Feats

Every hero chooses an Ancestry Feat at first level. You can find your feat slots by going to the Features tab, under the Ancestry Feat header. There should be an empty slot, which you can fill in two ways. You can drag an ancestry feat into that slot to choose it, or you can press the magnifying glass icon to open up the compendium browser with some helpfully preconfigured filters.

Note that if you chose a Versatile Heritage, you may also be able to choose feats from your Heritage as well as from your Ancestry.

Dwarf.name: 矮人 Dwarf
Dwarf.text:
矮人以坚忍严肃而闻名，他们深居地下，居住在建于最巍峨群山之心的城市中。他们在战场上异常凶悍，或是顶住冲锋的兽人，或是主动迎战高耸的巨人。矮人通常比大多数人类矮约一英尺，而且大多以编辫或打理头发为荣。

扮演矮人

将@Compendium[pf2e.ancestries.BYj5ZvlXZdpaEgA6]{Dwarf}族裔拖到你的角色卡上，以选择该族裔。这会自动将与矮人族裔相关的数项特性应用到你的角色上，其中一些在此说明。

生命值：矮人强韧耐打，能承受大量伤害。你从族裔获得10点生命值。

速度：矮人比大多数人更慢——他们的初始速度只有20。

黑暗视觉：矮人视力异常出色，即使在完全黑暗中也能看清。

姓名

矮人以取自祖先或矮人英雄的名字来荣耀自己的孩子；为孩子发明新名字，或从其他文化借用名字，都相当罕见。

示例姓名: Agna, Bodill, Dolgrin, Edrukk, Grunyar, Ingra, Kazmuk, Kotri, Lupp, Morgrym, Rogar, Rusilka, Torra, Yangrit

矮人传承

如同世界上大多数族群一样，矮人也有许多不同的家族谱系，各自拥有独特的传统与专长。

每个传承都会给予能反映你角色过往、教育与经历的益处。若你需要一些帮助，我们建议你从以下传承中选择一个。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.VTtXwBxrfRUXSL38]{Death Warden Dwarf}

你的祖先世代担任陵墓守卫，他们为抵御死灵术而培育的力量也传承给了你。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.5CqsBKCZuGON53Hk]{Forge Dwarf}

你很适应炎热环境，而且由于你和你的祖先长时间在炽热的锻炉前劳作，你懂得如何辨识优质武器。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.VSyOvtgJ1ZNpIVgC]{Rock Dwarf}

你的祖先曾在群山或地底深处的巨大远古岩石之间生活与劳作。



原文:

Dwarves are well-known as a stoic and stern people who dwell deep underground in cities built into the hearts of the mightiest mountains. They are fierce on the battlefield, holding the line against charging orcs or taking the fight to towering giants. Dwarves stand about a foot shorter than most humans, and most take pride in braiding or styling their hair.

Playing a Dwarf

Choose the @Compendium[pf2e.ancestries.BYj5ZvlXZdpaEgA6]{Dwarf} ancestry by dragging it onto your character sheet. This will automatically apply several of the features associated with the Dwarf ancestry to your character, some of which are explained here.

Hit Points: Dwarves are hardy and can take a lot of punishment. You start with 10 hit points from your ancestry.

Speed: Dwarves are slower than most- their starting Speed is only 20.

Darkvision: Dwarves can see exceptionally well, even in total darkness.

Names

Dwarves honor their children with names taken from ancestors or dwarven heroes, and it's quite rare to invent a new name or to borrow a name from another culture for a child.

Sample Names: Agna, Bodill, Dolgrin, Edrukk, Grunyar, Ingra, Kazmuk, Kotri, Lupp, Morgrym, Rogar, Rusilka, Torra, Yangrit

Dwarven Heritages

Like for most folk in the world, there are many different family lines of dwarves, all with their own traditions and specialties.

Each heritage grants benefits which reflect your character's past, education, and experiences. If you need some help, we suggest you pick one of the following heritages.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.VTtXwBxrfRUXSL38]{Death Warden Dwarf}

Your ancestors have been tomb guardians for generations, and the power that they cultivated to ward off necromancy has passed on to you.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.5CqsBKCZuGON53Hk]{Forge Dwarf}

You are well adapted to hot environments, and you know about quality weapons because of the time you and your ancestors put in working at hot forges.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.VSyOvtgJ1ZNpIVgC]{Rock Dwarf}

Your ancestors lived and worked among the great ancient stones of the mountains or the depths of the earth.

Elf.name: 精灵 Elf
Elf.text:
作为一个古老的族群，精灵拥有唯有见证历史长河方能获得的眼界。世界在他们周围变迁，而他们努力夺回自己的祖传家园，最显著的是从侵占其土地的可怕恶魔手中夺回。尽管以优雅、美貌与学识闻名，他们却更重视个人自由。

扮演精灵

将@Compendium[pf2e.ancestries.PgKmsA2aKdbLU6O0]{Elf}族裔拖到你的角色卡上，以选择该族裔。这会自动将与精灵族裔相关的数项特性应用到你的角色上，其中一些在此说明。

生命值：与其他族裔相比，精灵身形纤细且略显孱弱。你从你的族裔获得 6 生命值。

速度：凭借修长的双腿与从容的优雅，精灵比大多数族裔的人更快一些。你的初始速度为 30。

微光视觉：精灵能在昏暗光照下清晰视物。这使你更容易以处于阴影中的生物为目标。

姓名

精灵会对家人以外的人保守自己的本名，在与他人初次见面时会使用一个绰号。这个绰号会随着时间而改变，可能源于精灵生命中的事件，也可能只是心血来潮。对不同年龄与地区的熟人而言，同一名精灵可能以许多不同的名字为人所知。精灵名字由多个音节构成，并被设计成具有抒情般的流动感——至少在精灵语中如此。

示例姓名: Aerel, Amrunelara, Caladrel, Dardlara, Faunra, Heldalel, Jathal, Lanliss, Oparal, Seldlon, Soumral, Talathel, Tessara, Variel, Yalandlara, Zordlon

精灵传承

与世界上大多数族群一样，精灵也有许多不同的种类，来自不同的地区与家族。从以下传承中选择一个，并将其写在你族裔下方的传承区域。然后将其能力添加到你的角色卡上。

精灵能够活数百年，而在同一处地点生活足够久之后，他们会适应并与周遭环境相匹配。他们的皮肤与头发甚至会改变，例如林地精灵会呈现周围树木与叶片的颜色。因此，许多精灵传承都与他们所居住的环境相关。我们建议你从以下传承中选择一个。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.NfIAGatB1KIzt8G7]{Cavern Elf}

你生于地下，或在光线稀少的坑道或洞窟中度过了许多年。你的双眼对黑暗有着极佳的适应力。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.1wVDYY9Wue0G5R9Q]{Whisper Elf}

你的听觉极为敏锐，甚至能捕捉到最轻微的低语声。

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.nW1gi13E62Feto2w]{Woodland Elf}

你适应森林或幽深雨林中的生活，并且知道如何攀爬树木、利用枝叶为自己取得优势。



原文:

As an ancient people, elves have the perspective that can come only from watching the arc of history. The world has changed around them, and they struggle to reclaim their ancestral homes, most notably from terrible demons that have infested their lands. Though renowned for their grace, beauty, and knowledge, they place far more importance on personal freedom.

Playing an Elf

Choose the @Compendium[pf2e.ancestries.PgKmsA2aKdbLU6O0]{Elf} ancestry by dragging it onto your character sheet. This will automatically apply several of the features associated with the Elf ancestry to your character, some of which are explained here.

Hit Points: Elves are slender and slightly frailer compared to other ancestries. You start with 6 hit points from your ancestry.

Speed: With their long legs and easy grace, elves are a bit faster than people of most ancestries. Your starting Speed is 30.

Low-Light Vision: Elves can see well in dim light. This makes it easier for you to target creatures that are in shadow.

Names

An elf keeps their personal name secret from those outside their family, giving a nickname when meeting other people. This nickname can change over time, due to events in the elf's life or even on a whim. An elf might be known by many different names to associates of varying ages and regions. Elven names consist of multiple syllables and are meant to flow lyrically- at least in the Elven tongue.

Sample Names: Aerel, Amrunelara, Caladrel, Dardlara, Faunra, Heldalel, Jathal, Lanliss, Oparal, Seldlon, Soumral, Talathel, Tessara, Variel, Yalandlara, Zordlon

Elf Heritages

Like for most folk in the world, there are many different kinds of elves, hailing from different regions and families. Pick one of the following heritages and write it in the Heritage area under your ancestry . Then add its abilities to your character sheet.

Elves can live for hundreds of years, and after spending enough time in one locale, they adapt to match their surroundings. Their skin and hair can even change, such as woodland elves taking on the colors of the trees and leaves around them. Therefore, many elf heritages are connected to the environments in which they live. We suggest you pick one of the following heritages.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.NfIAGatB1KIzt8G7]{Cavern Elf}

You were born underground or spent many years in tunnels or caverns where light is scarce. Your eyes are exceptionally well adjusted to the dark.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.1wVDYY9Wue0G5R9Q]{Whisper Elf}

Your ears are finely tuned, able to detect even the slightest whispers of sound.

@Compendium[pf2e.heritages.nW1gi13E62Feto2w]{Woodland Elf}

You're adapted to life in the forest or the deep jungle, and you know how to climb trees and use foliage to your advantage.

Choosing a Class.name: 选择一个职业 Choosing a Class
Choosing a Class.text:
本日志的其他页面简要概述了4个最具代表性的职业。你可以自行决定是扮演这4个职业之一，还是扮演《Pathfinder Second Edition》规则集中提供的其他任何职业。

一旦你决定了最适合你的职业，就需要将其应用到你的角色上。你可以在角色卡的职业字段旁点击+图标，并从其中的选项里选择。

职业收益

当你选择一个职业时，你的角色卡会自动填入该职业授予的基础特性与收益。其他收益可能需要你在多个选项之间做出选择。

如果你不确定你的职业为你提供了什么，你可以打开你的职业物品，并在角色卡的主标签页中阅读其中包含的完整特性与收益列表。不过，你可能会觉得《Pathfinder Second Edition》核心规则书中的信息呈现方式更清晰易读。我们会在这里尽量提供概览，但若有疑问，就回去查阅规则书！

属性提升

选择一个职业会自动给予你一次对该职业“关键能力”的属性提升。对某些职业（例如法师）而言，这是固定的——对另一些职业而言，你可以自行选择。

此外，在这个阶段你还会获得4次自由属性提升的机会。它们可以分配给你选择的任何属性调整值，但每一次都必须分配给不同的属性。

所有这些属性提升都可以用与其他属性提升相同的方式进行管理，如@UUID[.lygt82lIvFJVGsUA]{调整能力分数}日志页面所述。

熟练项

你的职业会让你在某些武器、护甲和技能上获得受训。这些可以在角色卡的“技能”标签页中查看。

此外，你的职业还会赋予你选择若干额外技能与语言的能力。我们会在之后的@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.BEtnPZeVzTcELPDf]{完成你的英雄}部分再做这些选择，但别忘了它们！

特性

角色卡的“特性”标签页会显示职业特性与职业专长。添加你的职业后，基础特性会列在这里；随着你的角色升级，更多内容也会填入该标签页。花点时间熟悉它们。

有些职业可以在等级1立刻选择职业专长，而另一些则需要等到之后。与族裔专长一样，当你有新的选择需要做出时，这里会出现相应的槽位。

施法

有些职业是施法职业，这意味着他们需要使用角色卡的法术标签页。

创建施法条目并将法术添加进去并不会由系统自动替你完成。不过，描述你的角色如何与魔法交互以及其施法如何运作的规则，会包含在授予你施法能力的职业特性中。从那里开始，你应该能够填充你的法术标签页。

选择法术可能是扮演施法者最令人兴奋的部分之一。当你有一个施法条目时，你可以点击放大镜图标以打开资料库浏览器，它会显示一个已经预先筛选、且符合该等级可选条件的法术列表。但请注意，除非你的GM给予你特别许可，否则你很可能不能选择任何稀有度为Uncommon或更高的选项！



原文:

The other pages of this journal offer a brief overview of four of the most iconic classes available. It's up to you whether you'd like to play one of those four, or any of the other classes that are available in the Pathfinder Second Edition ruleset.

Once you've decided on the best class for you, you need to apply it to your character. You can do this by clicking on the + icon near the Class field of your character sheet and choosing it from the options there.

Class Benefits

When you choose a class, your character sheet will automatically be populated with the basic features and benefits granted by your class. Other benefits may require you to make a choice between several options.

If you ever are uncertain what your class is granting you, you can open your class item and read the full list of features and benefits that it contains from the main tab of your character sheet. However, you may find the way that the information is presented in the core rulebook for Pathfinder Second Edition to be more legible. We will try to offer an overview here, but when in doubt, refer back to the rulebook!

Attribute Boosts

Choosing a class will automatically grant you an attribute boost to that class's "key ability". For some classes, like Wizard, this is set- for others, you get a choice.

In addition, at this point you'll also be given the opportunity to take four free attribute boosts. These can be to any attribute modifier of your choice, although they must each be assigned to a different attribute.

All of these attribute boosts can be managed in the same ways as any other, as outlined in the @UUID[.lygt82lIvFJVGsUA]{Modifying Ability Scores} journal page.

Proficiencies

Your class will grant you training in certain weapons, armor, and skills. These can be viewed from the "skills" tab of your character sheet.

In addition, your class will grant you the ability to choose a number of additional skills and languages. We'll make these choices later, during the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.BEtnPZeVzTcELPDf]{Finishing your Hero} section, but don't forget about them!

Features

The "features" tab of your character sheet is where class features and class feats will appear. Once you add your class, the basic features will be listed here, and more will populate this tab as your character levels up. Take a moment to familiarise yourself with them.

Some classes can choose class feats immediately at level 1, while others will have to wait until later. As with Ancestry feats, a slot will appear for them when you have a new choice to make.

Spellcasting

Some classes are spellcasters, which means that they'll need to use the Spells tab of their character sheet.

Creating spellcasting entries and adding spells to them is not something that the system will do automatically for you. However, the rules that detail how your character interacts with magic and how their spellcasting works will be included in the class feature that granted you spellcasting. From there, you should be able to populate your Spells tab.

Choosing spells can be one of the most exciting parts of playing a spellcaster. When you have a spellcasting entry, you can click the magnifying glass icon to open the Compendium Browser to a pre-filtered list of spells that are valid choices for that level. Do note though that, unless your GM gives you special permission, you probably can't choose any of the options with a rarity of Uncommon or higher!

Cleric.name: 牧师 Cleric
Cleric.text:
蒙受神圣魔法的祝福，你践行信仰的理想，以教会的象征装点自身，并勤奋训练你神祇偏爱的武器。依你神祇的意志，你的法术可能保护并治疗盟友，也可能惩戒仇敌与信仰之敌。

如果你想要……就扮演牧师

  • 用神圣法术支援并治疗盟友。
  • 以你神祇偏爱的武器作战。
  • 了解宗教著作与图像。
  • 对抗并摧毁邪恶的不死生物。

在战斗遭遇中……

你在施放法术与以武器攻击之间取得平衡——通常使用你神祇偏爱的武器。你的多数法术都能强化、保护或治疗盟友。

在探索时……

你侦测附近的魔法，并解读你遇到的任何宗教文字或圣像。你也可能专注于一个防护法术，以防盟友遭到攻击。战斗或危害之后，你可能会治疗任何受伤的人。

标志性牧师：凯拉

@Actor[yoAU5rWYH4KJGPr5]{凯拉}

凯拉是@Compendium[pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}的女祭司。这位太阳女神教导追随者治疗伤者并摧毁邪恶。凯拉自幼便敬慕萨伦瑞神殿精美的彩色玻璃，以及那些每天黎明以弯刀优雅操练的女祭司。

当强盗袭击凯拉的村庄时，那些女祭司为保护村民战至最后一刻，但强盗人数太多，村庄化为火海。凯拉是少数幸存者之一；她在那座美丽神殿的冒烟废墟上，将自己的一生与持剑之臂誓奉萨伦瑞，承诺保护那些无法保护自己的人，并斩杀那些会伤害无辜者的人。

凯拉意志坚决，并为自己的信仰与弯刀技艺感到自豪。



原文:

Blessed with divine magic, you live the ideals of your faith, adorn yourself with the symbols of your church, and train diligently with your deity’s favored weapon. Your spells might protect and heal your allies, or they might punish foes and enemies of your faith, as your deity wills.

Play a Cleric If You Want To...

  • Support and heal your allies with divine spells.
  • Fight with the favored weapon of your deity.
  • Know about religious writing and images.
  • Oppose and destroy evil undead creatures.

During Combat Encounters...

You balance between casting spells and attacking with weapons—typically the favored weapon of your deity. Most of your spells can boost, protect, or heal your allies.

While Exploring...

You detect nearby magic and interpret any religious writing or icons you come across. You might also concentrate on a protective spell for your allies in case of attack. After a battle or hazard, you might heal anyone who was hurt.

The Iconic Cleric: Kyra

@Actor[yoAU5rWYH4KJGPr5]{Kyra}

Kyra is a priestess of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}, a sun goddess who teaches her followers to heal the wounded and destroy evil. Kyra grew up admiring the beautiful stained glass of Sarenrae's temple and the graceful priestesses who practiced with their scimitars each dawn.

When bandits attacked Kyra's village, those priestesses fought to the death to protect the villagers, but the bandits were too many and the village burned. Kyra was one of the few survivors, and on the smoking ruins of the beautiful temple she swore her life and sword arm to Sarenrae, promising to protect those who could not protect themselves and to slay those who would harm the innocent.

Kyra has a fierce will, and is proud of her faith and her skill with the scimitar.

Wizard.name: 法师 Wizard
Wizard.text:
你是宇宙奥秘的永恒学徒，运用你对魔法的精通来施展强大而毁灭性的法术。你把魔法当作一门科学，研读深奥的典籍，以理解魔法如何运作。

如果你想要……就扮演一名法师

  • 施放法术来摧毁敌人并保护盟友。
  • 比任何其他职业都更深入地理解魔法的各个学派。
  • 用你的魔法影响周遭世界并解决问题。

在战斗遭遇中……

你很可能会尽量远离战团，谨慎判断何时使用你的法术。你会保留最强大的魔法来使危险的敌人丧失行动能力，并用可重复使用的法术对付较弱的敌人。

在探索时……

你会定位魔法灵光，并判断你所发现的魔法文字或现象在奥术上的意义。当你遇到不寻常的障碍时，你多半会有一张卷轴或一个法术，让克服它变得更容易。

标志性法师：艾兹伦

@Actor[WNX5OQKPh4uaV7mW]{艾兹伦}

艾兹伦作为一名成功香料商人的幼子长大。他享受着殷实家庭的舒适生活，居住在一个相对少有犯罪的街区，也没有什么远大抱负。然而，当商人之神的教会指控他的父亲犯有异端与腐败之罪，毁掉了家族生意时，艾兹伦决心证明父亲的清白。令他震惊的是，教会的指控竟然属实。愤怒之下，艾兹伦离开了家，开始自学魔法，因为没有任何法师愿意收一个40岁的人为学徒。如今，他想要旅行世界，并在他人的人生中做出改变。

艾兹伦对人性抱持怀疑，转而把信任寄托在自己卓越的才智与魔法能力上。



原文:

You're an eternal student of the universe's arcane secrets, using your mastery of magic to cast powerful and devastating spells. You treat magic like a science and study esoteric tomes to understand how magic works.

Play a Wizard If You Want To...

  • Cast spells to devastate foes and protect allies.
  • Gain a deeper understanding of the schools of magic than any other class.
  • Influence the world around you and solve problems with your magic.

During Combat Encounters...

You likely try to stay out of the fray, carefully judging when to use your spells. You save your most powerful magic to incapacitate threatening foes and use your reusable spells against weaker enemies.

While Exploring...

You locate magical auras and determine the arcane significance of magical writing or phenomena you uncover. When you run across an unusual obstacle, you probably have a scroll or spell that should make it easier to overcome.

The Iconic Wizard: Ezren

@Actor[WNX5OQKPh4uaV7mW]{Ezren}

Ezren was raised as a younger son of a successful spice merchant. He enjoyed the comforts of a well-to-do family, lived in a neighborhood that was relatively free of crime, and had no lofty ambitions. However, when the church of the merchant god accused his father of heresy and corruption, ruining the family business, Ezren was determined to prove his father's innocence. To his shock, the church's accusations were true. Outraged, Ezren left his home and began studying magic on his own, as no wizard would take a 40-year-old as an apprentice. Now he wants to travel the world and make a difference in other peoples' lives.

Ezren is skeptical of human nature, instead putting his trust in his own brilliant intellect and magical abilities.
